module: Module-level comment: The 'alt_vipvfr130_prc' module is designed for image/video data processing with Avalon MM and streaming interfaces. It configures memory read operations, processes incoming data, and streams it out. The module is structured with a read master for memory interfacing, a processing core for data manipulation, a control interface for register interaction, and an optional streaming output controller, all parameterizable for flexible system integration.
